SEARCH
Package camppkg

Interface iCampStudent

All Known Subinterfaces:
iCampCommMember
All Known Implementing Classes:
CampManager
public interface iCampStudent
Interface for Student to access camp manager

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Camp

    Get the Camp object associated with the campID.
    CampInformation

    Get the camp information of a cmap.

  • Method Details

    • getVisibleCampList

      ArrayList<String> getVisibleCampList(Faculty faculty)
      Get the list of camps visible for the student of a certain faculty.
      Parameters:
      faculty - the faculty of the viewing Student
      Returns:
      ArrayList of campID visible to students of the faculty

    • getRegisteredCampList

      ArrayList<String> getRegisteredCampList(String studentID, String roleID)
      Get the list of registered camps for a particular student regardless of role.
      Parameters:
      studentID - ID of the Student user.
      roleID - role of the Student user
      Returns:
      ArrayList of campID of the registered camps.

    • getCampInfo

      CampInformation getCampInfo(String campID)
      Get the camp information of a cmap.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the target camp.
      Returns:
      CampInformation object for the target camp.

    • getCamp

      Camp getCamp(String campID)
      Get the Camp object associated with the campID.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the target camp.
      Returns:
      Camp object.

    • register

      void register(String campID, String studentID, String roleID)
      Allow a student to register for a role in a camp. Student cannot register if they have already registered or if registeration period is over. Or if the camp clashes with one of the other camps they have already registered for.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the target camp
      studentID - ID of the student registering
      roleID - ID of the desired role

    • withdraw

      void withdraw(String campID, String studentID)
      Allow a student to withdraw from a camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the target camp
      studentID - ID of the student withdrawing
